data.title: Invest in Luxury Vacation Homes with Equity Residences
data.meta_description: Equity Residences offers the opportunity to invest in luxury vacation homes. Enjoy the freedom and flexibility of owning a second home without the upkeep.
data.text:
Equity Residences is a luxury vacation residence fund for accredited investors. You invest in a portfolio of homes in prime locations with high potential for appreciation. At the end of the 10-year investment period, we sell the homes and you and our other investors recoup your initial investments plus any investment gains. In the meantime, you and your family have access to our luxury vacation residences, plus hundreds of others through our affiliates.

Your luxury real estate investment lasts a decade. Your vacation memories last forever.

Explore the Equity Platinum Fund

Equity Residences is redefining vacation home ownership by making them an affordable and financially attractive investment. Our latest offering, the Equity Platinum Fund, includes exclusive residences in Hawaii, California, and Floridaâ€”luxury residences that could be yours to enjoy.

Learn more about why the Equity Platinum Fund is both a smarter way to invest and a smarter way to vacation.

Read More
